titleStmt.title: A brief discourse concerning the unlawfulness of the common-prayer-worship and of laying the hand on and kissing the booke in swearing / by a reverend and learned divine.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

notesStmt.note: "The authorship is acknowledged by Increase Mather in Some remarks, on a pretended answer to a discourse concerning the common-prayer worship."--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
